Articles.Content: So ... Make something like this : You can make everything what make boeing company like : http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/40/Continental_Airlines_Boeing_767-400ER_Wedelstaedt.jpg and this http://ghostsofdc.wpengine.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/air-force-one-1963.jpg so that is all you need to know.

I strongly suggest reading the challenge guidelines. Are we competing on size? Range? Passenger-capacity? Are we restricted to stock KSP or can we use mods like B9 (more parts) and Ferram Aerospace Research (better air physics)? Should it be a replica (if so, I've got a highly accurate 747 that can't easily takeoff) or an original design?

I suggest you make some kinds of scoring system and rules.
Also, the example there probably doesn't need 1/3 of those struts. It is a pretty light and tough plane to begin with.
they're also on pylons rather than being attached directly to the wings (which'd be a bit silly considering what comes out the back of the engine).
